    • Method Detail

      • filterMethods

        public java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Method> filterMethods(java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Method> a,
                                                              Options o)
        Remove any Method objects from a given List of Method objects that is deemed unfriendly to be shown to the end user

        A Method is deemed friendly if it doesn't supply all of the following conditions:

        1) The name of the Method contains "get" to mark it as a Getter (which typically signifies that the information is safe to be viewed) 2) The method returns something other than void 3) The method's access modifier is public - if it is not, the data it returns is assumed to be for internal use, hence the encapsulation 4) The method must have a parameter count of 0 5) The method must not be "getClass", as Class objects are deemed unfriendly, and can cause StackOverflowError due to Class.getClassLoader() 6) The method must not be static.

        Specified by:
        filterMethods in interface UnfriendlyFilter
        Parameters:
        a - A list of Method object to filter
        o - The Options to use
        Returns:
        A filtered list of Method objects

      • filterFields

        public java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Field> filterFields(java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Field> a,
                                                            Options o)
        Remove any Field objects from a given List of Field objects that is deemed unfriendly to be shown to the end user.

        Most fields of a class are usually encapsulated, so it's unlikely that any will be included. Because of the unlikelihood of a public field, fields aren't scanned unless the given Options class has Options.isIncludeFields() set to true

        A Field is deemed unfriendly if it doesn't supply all of the following conditions. 1) The Field must be public 2) The Field must not be static, as this usually indicates a constant. 3) The Field must not be transient

        Specified by:
        filterFields in interface UnfriendlyFilter
        Parameters:
        a - A List of Field objects to be filtered
        o - The Options to use
        Returns:
        A filtered List of Field objects
